attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Comes with the remainder of a 3 year or 120 000kms warranty plan, expiring in April 2024.
This very popular hatch is an excellent vehicle that is still in very good condition, only just over a year old and very low mileage.
It is a reliable vehicle that is cost effective to maintain, comfortable, spacious and an awesome drive. It is excellent value for money at this price.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252681. Comes with the remainder of a 6 year or 150 000kms warranty, expiring in July 2027.
This great little bakkie is only a few months old, has almost no mileage on the clock and is still in brand new condition. This great bakkie is very versatile, being comfortable enough for personal use, but also safe enough and rugged enough for business or commercial use.
This vehicle is cost effective to maintain and excellent value for money at this price.
Test drives are available, trade ins are welcome and finance can be arranged.
Please note that the advertised price does not include admin fees of R8500 which will be charged on all vehicles sold.

attributes.title: 2022 Nissan NP200 1.6

attributes.description: For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877248209. Warranty – 5year/200 000km Service – 5 years/90 000km The ALL NEW Civic RS is equipped with sporty features such as RS bumpers and side skirts, gloss black mirror housings and black door handles, 18-inch black alloy wheels, sunroof, LED headlights, smoked rear LED taillights, boot lid spoiler and a dual exhaust system. The Civic RS is available in 5 colours including Platinum White, Meteoroid Grey Metallic, Lunar Silver Metallic, Cherry Red Metallic and Brilliant Sporty Blue Metallic. In terms of infotainment, a 9-inch HMI infotainment system is fitted and it offers integrated navigation as well as Apple CarPlay and Android Auto functionality. The system adopts an easy-to-use smartphone-style menu layout. The Civic RS is also equipped with a wireless smartphone charger.

attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0877252276. Balance of Warranty 4year/120 000km  

FREE Service Plan 6year / 90 000km

!!FREE EXTRA'S - Leather Seats, Bin Lining, Smash and grab, 17" Alloy wheels and touch screen!!

The perfect workhorse. This bakkie is big, it is tough and it is practical with enough space inside to be comfortable and a big loadbox. The Ranger is a beauty, lovely growl and very powerful engine. It will ensure that any job is completed whether it is carrying heavy loads, towing tons of gear or tackling tough terrains. 

Price excludes License, Reg, Doc & delivery fees. Trade in’s welcome.

We offer Extended Warranties/Service Plans/ Maintenance Plans.
